channel.title: I'm just starting Mopar...Help me! Please :D
channel.description:
Well I went onto the website at the login page and it says the sever ip: 127.0.0.1 then I put the username in or what ever and it says "error connecting to server. must be down. click cancel then start servertomake your own"
I try to put in servers that I've found but it still doesnt work...
Please help me get started! :confused:

item.title: I'm just starting Mopar...Help me! Please :D
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

moparisthebest.com

When it loads… click “Start Server” Then click join server and type in name and password and leave it at that and just connect.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm just starting Mopar...Help me! Please :D

item.title: I'm just starting Mopar...Help me! Please :D
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

If you are entering 127.0.0.1 you need to run your own source, if you wan’t to play other servers enter their IP which you can find at www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php if it has error connecting it means the server is offline.

Read full topic
